title: "Poland's PGNiG aims to increase gas production using AI"
excerpt: "Polish gas group PGNiG (PGN.WA) may increase its recoverable gas reserves in Poland by a cumulative 7.3 billion cubic metres in 2021 and 2022 by using artificial intelligence, it said on Monday."
